Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Birdie \Bird"ie\, n. A pretty or dear little bird; -- a pet name. --Tennyson. [1913 Webster]

birdie n 1: (golf) a score of one stroke under par on a hole 2: badminton equipment consisting of a ball of cork or rubber with a crown of feathers [syn: {shuttlecock}, {bird}, {shuttle}] v : to shoot in one stroke under par
